reuters.title: Bank of England says issuing further one billion stg 8-3/4 pct bonds due 1997
reuters.body: A decision on final dumping duties on frozen orange juice from Brazil may not be issued until tomorrow, Commerce Department officials said. They said the department has until midnight tonight to set the duty but may not make the finding public until tomorrow. A preliminary duty of 8.54 pct was set October 17, 1986. The final ruling will be based on more detailed information, the officials said. Reuter 
